variable.name: geneva_id
variable.description: Participant's randomly generated GENEVA ID

variable.name: final_type
variable.description: Final case-control status

variable.name: ndss_drive
variable.description: Drive Subscale of NDSS

variable.name: ndss_stereotypy
variable.description: Stereotypy Subscale of NDSS

variable.name: ndss_continuity
variable.description: Continuity Subscale of NDSS

variable.name: ndss_priority
variable.description: Priority Subscale of NDSS

variable.name: ndss_tolerance
variable.description: Tolerance Subscale of NDSS

variable.name: ndss_score
variable.description: Total Overall Score on the Nicotine Dependence Syndrome (NDSS) Scale

variable.name: wisdm_attach
variable.description: WISDM Affiliative Attachment Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_auto
variable.description: WISDM Automaticity Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_control
variable.description: WISDM Control Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_behav
variable.description: WISDM Behavioral Choice/Melioration Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_cognitive
variable.description: WISDM Cognitive Enhancement Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_craving
variable.description: WISDM Craving Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_cue
variable.description: WISDM Cue Exposure/Associative Processes Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_negative
variable.description: WISDM Negative Reinforcement Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_positive
variable.description: WISDM Positive Reinforcement Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_goads
variable.description: WISDM Social/Environmental Goads Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_senses
variable.description: WISDM Taste/Sensory Properties Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_tolerance
variable.description: WISDM Tolerance Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_wtcntrl
variable.description: WISDM Weight Control Subscale (Mean)

variable.name: wisdm_score
variable.description: Score on the Wisconsin Index of Smoking Dependence Motives (WISDM) Scale (Sum of Means)

variable.name: sex
variable.description: Participant's gender

variable.name: study
variable.description: Study from which the data were generated

variable.name: int_yr
variable.description: Year of interview

variable.name: age_int
variable.description: Age at interview

variable.name: y_o_b
variable.description: Year of birth

variable.name: hisp
variable.description: Is participant Hispanic or Latino?

variable.name: race
variable.description: Participant's self-identified race

variable.name: height
variable.description: Participant's height in inches

variable.name: weight
variable.description: Participant's weight in pounds

variable.name: ed_grade
variable.description: Highest level of education completed
variable.value: 1 year of college or technical school
Post graduate education: M.S., M.A., J.D., M.D., Ph.D.

variable.name: ed_cat
variable.description: Highest education category

variable.name: income
variable.description: Annual household gross income

variable.name: ever_drink
variable.description: Ever had even one drink of alcohol

variable.name: ons_reg_drink
variable.description: Age onset of regular drinking (drinking once a month for 6 months or more)

variable.name: age_first_got_drunk
variable.description: Age when first got drunk

variable.name: max_drinks
variable.description: Largest number of alcoholic drinks consumed in 24 hours

variable.name: alc_sx1
variable.description: Tolerance to alcohol

variable.name: alc_sx2
variable.description: Withdrawal from alcohol

variable.name: alc_sx3
variable.description: Using alcohol in larger amounts or over longer period than intended

variable.name: alc_sx4
variable.description: Persistent desire or unsuccessful efforts to cut down or control alcohol use

variable.name: alc_sx5
variable.description: Great amount of time spent in activities necessary to obtain, use or recover from the effects of alcohol

variable.name: alc_sx6
variable.description: Gave up or reduced important social, occupational, or recreational activities because of alcohol use

variable.name: alc_sx7
variable.description: Alcohol use despite knowledge of persistent or recurrent physical or psychological problems likely to have been caused or exacerbated by alcohol

variable.name: alc_sx_tot
variable.description: Number of alcohol symptoms endorsed
variable.comment: Number of yes answers in alc_sx1 thru alc_sx7

variable.name: alc_dep
variable.description: DSM4 alcohol dependence

variable.name: alc_dep_ons
variable.description: Age onset of DSM4 alcohol dependence

variable.name: alc_dep_rec
variable.description: Age recency of DSM4 alcohol dependence

variable.name: age_first_drink
variable.description: Age when had first drink of alcohol

variable.name: age_last_drink
variable.description: Age when had last drink of alcohol

variable.name: nic_sx1
variable.description: Tolerance to nicotine

variable.name: nic_sx2
variable.description: Withdrawal from nicotine

variable.name: nic_sx3
variable.description: Using tobacco in larger amounts or over longer period than intended

variable.name: nic_sx4
variable.description: Persistent desire or unsuccessful efforts to cut down or control tobacco use

variable.name: nic_sx5
variable.description: Great amount of time spent in activities necessary to obtain, use or recover from the effects of tobacco

variable.name: nic_sx6
variable.description: Gave up or reduced important social, occupational, or recreational activities because of tobacco use

variable.name: nic_sx7
variable.description: Tobacco use despite knowledge of persistent or recurrent physical or psychological problems likely to have been caused or exacerbated by tobacco

variable.name: ever_cig
variable.description: Has participant ever smoked a cigarette?

variable.name: age_first_use_tob
variable.description: Age onset of any tobacco use

variable.name: age_last_use_tob
variable.description: Age when last used any form of tobacco

variable.name: cig_100
variable.description: Has participant smoked 100 cigarettes lifetime?

variable.name: cig_daily
variable.description: Has participant ever smoked cigarettes daily for a month or more?

variable.name: cig_min_use
variable.description: Has participant smoked 100 cigarettes in lifetime OR ever smoked daily for a month or more?

variable.name: max_cigs
variable.description: Largest number of cigarettes smoked in 24 hours

variable.name: ftnd_1
variable.description: Participant's lifetime score for Fagerström Test for Nicotine Dependence (FTND) question 1: How soon after waking do you smoke your first cigarette?

variable.name: ftnd_2
variable.description: Participant's lifetime score for FTND question 2: Do you find it difficult to refrain from smoking in places where it is forbidden?

variable.name: ftnd_3
variable.description: Participant's lifetime score for FTND question 3: Which cigarette would you hate most to give up?

variable.name: ftnd_4
variable.description: Participant's lifetime score for FTND question 4: How many cigarettes/day do you smoke?

variable.name: ftnd_5
variable.description: Participant's lifetime score for FTND question 5: Do you smoke more frequently during the first hours after waking than during the rest of the day?

variable.name: ftnd_6
variable.description: Participant's lifetime score for FTND question 6: Do you smoke when you are so ill that you are in bed most of the day?

variable.name: ftnd_total
variable.description: Participant's lifetime score on the FTND

variable.name: nic_sx_tot
variable.description: Number of nicotine symptoms endorsed
variable.comment: Number of yes answers in nic_sx1 thru nic_sx7

variable.name: nic_dep
variable.description: DSM4 nicotine dependence

variable.name: nic_dep_ons
variable.description: Age onset of DSM4 nicotine dependence

variable.name: nic_dep_rec
variable.description: Age recency of DSM4 nicotine dependence

variable.name: oth_sx1
variable.description: Tolerance to drugs other than marijuana, cocaine or opiates

variable.description: Withdrawal from drugs other than marijuana, cocaine or opiates

variable.description: Using drugs other than marijuana, cocaine or opiates in larger amounts or over longer period than intended

variable.description: Persistent desire or unsuccessful efforts to cut down or control drugs other than marijuana, cocaine or opiates

variable.description: Age when first used drugs other than marijuana, cocaine or opiates

variable.description: Number of symptoms endorsed for drugs other than marijuana, cocaine or opiates

variable.description: DSM4 dependence on drugs other than marijuana, cocaine or opiates

variable.description: Consent group
